resources.string:
This app will convert currencies
using the exchange rate provided by ecb,
 if you have to convert your money with a rate
 of days before you can pick any working day
 clicking the button Pick date
 
 in the next view you will select your currencies
and insert the amount of money, click the button Convert
 the result will appear below
 the arrow button is provided to switch the selected currencies
 
 in case of no internet the app will use
an old version downloaded days before
